summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the north 5 feet of the east 75 feet of Lot 5, and the east 75 feet of Lot 6, Block 7, J. H. Nagle's Addition; and Tract 35, Sarah B. Yesler's Tracts; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-290 and 17-236, respectively.
